SHAFT_Engine, 4.3.20200810

Uses of Class
com.shaft.gui.element.ElementActions

Packages that use ElementActions 
Package Description
com.shaft.gui.element  

  • Uses of ElementActions in com.shaft.gui.element

    Methods in com.shaft.gui.element that return ElementActions 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ElementActions ElementActions.click​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator)
    Clicks on a certain element using Selenium WebDriver, or JavaScript
    ElementActions ElementActions.clickAndHold​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator)
    Waits for the element to be clickable, and then clicks and holds it.
    ElementActions ElementActions.clipboardActions​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator, java.lang.String action)
    Attempts to perform a native clipboard action on the text from a certain web element, like copy/cut/paste
    ElementActions ElementActions.doubleClick​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator)
    Double-clicks on an element using Selenium WebDriver's Actions Library
    ElementActions ElementActions.dragAndDrop​(org.openqa.selenium.By sourceElementLocator, org.openqa.selenium.By destinationElementLocator)
    Drags the source element and drops it onto the destination element
    ElementActions ElementActions.dragAndDropByOffset​(org.openqa.selenium.By sourceElementLocator, int xOffset, int yOffset)
    Drags the source element and drops it onto the determined offset
    ElementActions ElementActions.hover​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator)
    Hovers over target element.
    ElementActions ElementActions.hoverAndClick​(java.util.List<org.openqa.selenium.By> hoverElementLocators, org.openqa.selenium.By clickableElementLocator)
    Hovers over the hoverElements in sequence then clicks the clickableElement
    ElementActions ElementActions.keyPress​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator, org.openqa.selenium.Keys keys)
    Sends a keypress to the target element.
    ElementActions ElementActions.select​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator, java.lang.String text)
    Selects an element from a dropdown list using its displayed text
    ElementActions ElementActions.setContext​(java.lang.String context)
    Switches focus to another context
    ElementActions ElementActions.setValueUsingJavaScript​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator, java.lang.String value)
    Used to set value for an element (hidden or visible) using javascript
    ElementActions ElementActions.submitFormUsingJavaScript​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator)
    Used to submit a form using javascript
    static ElementActions ElementActions.switchToDefaultContent()
    Switches focus to default content, is mainly used in coordination with switchToIframe(WebDriver, By) to exit any iFrame layer and go back to the main page
    ElementActions ElementActions.switchToIframe​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator)
    Switches focus to a certain iFrame, is mainly used in coordination with switchToDefaultContent(WebDriver) to navigate inside any iFrame layer and go back to the main page
    ElementActions ElementActions.switchToWindow​(java.lang.String nameOrHandle)
    Switches focus to another window
    ElementActions ElementActions.type​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator, java.lang.String text)
    Checks if there is any text in an element, clears it, then types the required string into the target element.
    ElementActions ElementActions.typeAppend​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator, java.lang.String text)
    Appends the required string into the target element, regardless of the current text value.
    ElementActions ElementActions.typeFileLocationForUpload​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator, java.lang.String absoluteFilePath)
    Types the required file path into an input[type='file'] button, to successfully upload the target file.
    ElementActions ElementActions.typeSecure​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator, java.lang.String text)
    Checks if there is any text in an element, clears it, then types the required string into the target element.
    ElementActions ElementActions.waitForElementToBePresent​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator, int numberOfTries, boolean stateOfPresence)
    Waits dynamically for a specific element to achieve the desired stateOfPresence on the current page.
    ElementActions ElementActions.waitForTextToChange​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator, java.lang.String initialValue, int numberOfTries)
    Waits dynamically for a specific element's text to change from the initial value to a new unknown value.
